channel.title: general on Something Stochastic
channel.description: Recent content in general on Something Stochastic

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World! This is my first post on Something Stochastic, my personal tech blog that aims to be good, occassionally poor. Why bother? If you scroll with LinkedIn you might find a questionale post or two about how people don’t like selling themselves, that we need to do better because of how more often than not we end up deflecting complements it with a self-deprecating counter-comment. I found there is a truth to them, and I’m just a guilty in this.
